faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers.

faqs.question: How long does shipping take?
faqs.answer: Shipping times vary depending on your location. Typically, it takes 3-5 business days for domestic orders and 7-10 business days for international orders.

faqs.question: Do you offer returns or exchanges?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have a hassle-free return and exchange policy. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can return it within 30 days for a refund or exchange.

faqs.question: Is my personal information secure?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We prioritize the security of our customers' information. We use industry-standard encryption and follow strict privacy practices to ensure your data is safe.

faqs.question: Can I track my order?
faqs.answer: Yes, once your order is shipped, we'll provide you with a tracking number. You can use this tracking number to monitor the progress of your shipment.

faqs.question: Do you offer international shipping?
faqs.answer: Yes, we ship internationally to most countries. Additional shipping fees and customs duties may apply depending on your location.

faqs.question: What is your warranty policy?
faqs.answer: We offer a 1-year warranty on all our products. If you encounter any defects or issues within the warranty period, please contact our customer support for assistance.

faqs.question: How can I contact customer support?
faqs.answer: You can reach our customer support team via email at support@example.com or by calling our toll-free number during business hours.
